reviewText: I was very pleased with this order. It was an used item but works perfect. I would recommend to all my friends. I chose this item because it was a movie I could not find anywhere else cause of being old and not very popular. I am happy!
I like the movie because my dad is a lawyer & i like finding out how people get the way they are.

I saw this movie a long time ago on TV. I tried to buy it on DVD but it is not available. I made my own DVD from the video. Near the end, the video was very damaged and would not play. It was in terrible condition. I wrote the seller and no response.

In BETTER OFF DEAD, a prosecutor (Ferrell) who won a death conviction against a murderess (Winningham) works to overturn the sentence seven years later, even as the execution date approaches. Her biggest obstacle: the condemned wants to die in the gas chamber. As of 6/09, "Better Off Dead" was not available on DVD. Related item: In the most excellent film noir I WANT TO LIVE! (1958), Susan Hayward stars as a woman sentenced to die in California's gas chamber who loses one appeal after another. Cast includes Simon Oakland, Theodore Bikel, Raymond Bailey and Gavin MacLeod. Cameo by Jack Weston. (VHS) (DVD) Parenthetical number preceding title is a 1 to 10 viewer poll rating found at a film resource website. (6.3) Better Off Dead (TV-1993) - Mare Winningham/Tyra Ferrell/Kevin Tighe/Don Harvey/Marilyn Coleman

I happened to stumble on this piece of work while thumbing thru the channels during my vacation in Aurora, Colorado, and I have to say that Mare Winningham played a wonderful part in this fine piece of work, directed by Neema Barnette.  I happened to be drawn in by it because of everyday's life unexpected events that could turn wrong.  Believe me, if you're into drama or suspense, this one's for you.  If you get a chance to view, "Better Off Dead," please email me at jerrywashere2000@yahoo and tell me what you think.  Thanks for viewing!!!  ;-)
